bsil bar byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zha sdang dang / gti mug dang / ngan 'gro dang / ngan par lta ba dang / nyes byas dang /
the tsom dang / phongs pa mi zad pa dang / yul la sred pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad pa dang / nad rnams bcil nas dam pa ma yin pa'i chos la sred pa la sogs pa'i
gdung ba dag dam pa'i chos kyi char dang 'dres pa'i bla na med pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / smon lam dang / mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / 'grogs pa dang / bstan pa don yod pa
la sogs pas rab tu zhi bar byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed cing nyon mongs pa med pa'i sa la 'god pa
yin no/ /rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun par byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rigs
kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i rlung gi mthus sems can thams cad 'tsho'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i bstabs pa'i chos dkar po'i rlung mar nye bar spyor ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad skyed pas kyang sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/
dper na rlung mar ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'di lta ste/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang / khor yug ri dag dang / khor yug gi ri chen po rnams dang / gling chen po bzhi yongs su 'dzin
pa'i gser gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang bcas pa rnams dang / ri rab dang / ri rab chen po dang / de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i ri dang / gangs dang / ri spos

kyi ngad ldang ba dang / grong rdal dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang dag dang / 'dzam bu'i gling dag dang / gling chen po bzhi dag dang / stong dag dang / stong gnyis pa dag dang / stong gsum gyi
stong chen po dag dang / bkod pa rnam par phye ba sna tshogs mngon par sgrub po/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang phyogs bcu kun du sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi
phung po phun sum tshogs pa nye bar sgrub po/ /skyed do/ /yongs su gzhog go/ /de la ji ltar gangs kyi ri phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/ /
ji ltar gling chen po bzhi dang ri rab phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/ /ji ltar stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni rang
sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/ /ji ltar stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/ /ji ltar stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam
mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ shin du rnams par dag par grags pa mchod pa la dmigs pa thams cad la yang dag par gnas pa rnams kyis thams cad mngon du byas te/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/ /de la rgya mtsho ltar ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho rnams blta'o/ /gling dang /
bar gyi gling dang / ri gzhan dang / gling chen po bzhi pa la sogs pa ltar ni sbyor ba dang / gzungs dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / slob ma'i dge 'dun la sogs pa blta'o/ /
grong rdal dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang ltar ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa rnams blta'o/ /dpag bsam gyi shing gi nags tshal ltar ni sa dang pha rol
du phyin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / ye shes snang ba dang / dbang dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
kyi stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / snying rje chen po la sogs pa dbang sgyur ba dam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i chos rnams blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya ba'i mtshan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed dag na sems can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad stong gsum phrag bcu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ de lta bu'i 'khor los
sgyur ba'i dngos po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de bsdoms pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba chen po gcig cig ldan par gyur pa te/ rnam grangs des shar phyogs
su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das te/ de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de snyed cig 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de 'dra ba nyid dang so sor ldan par gyur la/ snga ma
bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag na sems can yod do cog ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu sha stag dang / so sor
ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du bgrang ba de snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa'i brgya byin sha stag tu gyur la/
phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i brgya byin rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dang brgya byin gcig cig
ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de thams cad brgya byin de dang
'dra ba sha stag tu gyur la/ bgrang ba de nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad tshangs
pa chen por gyur la/ bsod nams de thams cad gcig tu bsdoms pa dang tshangs pa chen po gcig cig ldan par gyur la/ tshangs pa chen po ji ltar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin

du gyur te/ snga ma bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dag dang / rang sangs rgyas dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po thob pa/ 'od zer gyi sprin chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/
dbang bcu thob pa sha stag du gyur te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i sems can thams cad phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / nam mkha'i dbyings su gtogs pa'i dus
gsum pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dus gsum gyi nam mkha'i dbyings su gtogs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni
rdul phra rab brgyar bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig mngon par 'grub bo/ /ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong grangs med pa bcur
bsgyur bas/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu las dpe byad bzang po re re mngon par 'grub po/ /dpe byad bzang por gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de thams cad brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bas/

de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa dgu las mtshan re re mngon par 'grub bo/ /de yang brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu zla ba nya ste dri ma med pa'i
dkyil 'khor stong bas kyang lhag par mdzes pa'i 'od dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub po/ /de yang brjod du med pa bye ba stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug 'gro ba thams
cad las mngon par 'phags shing bltar mi snang ba gtsug tor gyis yongs su brgyan pa mngon par 'grub po/ /de yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcur
bsgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag stong phrag drug bcu pa dmigs pa thams cad las gsung gi sgra mtha' yas par 'byung ba lhun gyis grub pas sems can thams
cad bsam pa yongs su sim par gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du go bar byed pa mngon par 'grub ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams
brgya pa'i mtshan ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang ldan zhing kun du rgyas par byed pa bkod pa dang ldan pas sems can
thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag pa bzung na/ gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa
thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rgyan 'chang ba/ dbang bcu la dbang
sgyur ba sha stag tu gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser las byas pa'i snod rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs

kyis spras pa nam mkha'i tshad tsam gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed so so nas thogs te/ phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par yongs su bkang zhing skad cig skad cig du blangs shing khyer yang ba spu'i khung
bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gang ba 'am 'bri bar mi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams brgya'i mtshan ni bsam gyis mi khyab

po/ /de las bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma skyed pa'i sa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro ba can dang / shin du dka' rgyal dang / mngon du

gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa kun du 'od de/ bcu gnyis po de ni de dag go/ /de la byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i
sa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byis pa'i spyod pa dang / log pa'i nan tan thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
'jig rten skyong ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang khyad zhugs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ rnam pa thams cad du dpal dang ldan pa'i lus dang /
ngag dang / yid kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i stobs kyi shugs 'chang ba/ 'jig

rten gyi khams grangs med par skad cig re re la 'gro zhing 'ong na dri zhim po dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba'i tshogs chen po gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun du 'byung ba'i pad mas rkang pa
yongs su brtan pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' dang mnyam pa'i stan gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad shin du rnam par non pa'i lhag mthong rnam par bsgom pas thogs pa med cing
yid du 'ong ba'i dmigs pa'i mtshan ma chen po bcu la sogs pa grangs med pa'i ltas bzang po mthong ba/ phyir mi ldog pa/ phyogs kyi nags tshal thibs po mtha' yas pa thams cad du 'od kyi dra
ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'gyed pas zhing dpag tu med pa'i rgyan byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi mnga' bdag dpag tu med pa snyed kyi bdag gi gzugs brnyan gyis
dbang bskur ba/ yang dag par mnod pa'i dbang dang byin gyi brlabs la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che'i char gyi snang ba'i sgo dpag tu med pa thams cad
gtan pa med par kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mchod sbyin chen po'i sprin gtong ba lhur byed pa/ blta na bzang zhing yid du 'ong la mdzes shing dge la 'gro ba thams cad dang mi mthun pa med cing don
yod par bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rab tu g.yo bar byed cing 'gro ba ngan 'gro la sogs pa las sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su skyob
pa/ mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang chos kyi sgo 'dzin nus pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa grangs med pas rnam
par rol pa/ chos mtha' yas pa la dga' zhing mos pas zang zing med par phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mthar thug par rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub pa'i dga' ba'i shugs kyi snang ba
'thob pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ther 'bum dpag tu med par theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i bsgom pa sna tshogs yongs su rdzogs la/ gzhan gyi don gyi nan tan tshar
phyin pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs mngon par bsgrubs par grub pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i mos pa chen po'i yang chen pos spyad pa'i chos nyid
kyis sa dang po de ma thag tu 'thob par gang gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sa'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i
rgyal po ni mi'i kha dog las 'das la/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad
las ni 'das pa yin/ don dam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni ma thob pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi sa kun du 'od ni mtha' dang dbung med pa ma lus pa dri ma med pa'i chos thams
cad la dbang sgyur ba ste/ kun du shin du lta ba/ sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de la ting nge 'dzin rnams gang zhe na/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rin chen kun du 'phags pa dang / shin du gnas pa dang / mi sgal ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / rin chen 'byung
gnas dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid dang / don thams cad grub pa dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/
de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni mtha' yas so/ /gzungs ni bcu gnyis te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang bskur ldan dang / ye shes
ldan dang / sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa dang / mi zad pa'i za ma tog dang / 'khyal pa mtha' yas dang / rgya mtsho mtha' yas dang / rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya dang / pad ma bkod pa dang / chags pa med
pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
sku'i kha dog rdzogs pa mngon par sgrub pa'i gzungs te/ de dag la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /mngon par shes pa ni drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang /
pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa'i shes pa dang / gang zag pa zad par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste drug po de
dag go/ /dbang ni bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe'i tshad bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par byin gyis rlob pas tshe la dbang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin brjod du med pa'i yang brjod
du med pa la nges par rtog cing 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bkod pa'i rgyan du mas brgyan par byin gyis rlob pa ston pa'i tshul
gyis yo byad la dbang ba dang / dus ji bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob pa ston pas las la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba ston pas skye ba
la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su gang ba ston pas mos pa la dbang ba dang / dus dang zhing gang du 'dod par mngon par rdzogs par byang
chub pa ston pas smon lam la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / chos kyi
sgo snang ba mtha' dang dbung med pa yongs su ston pas chos la dbang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan
dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa dang / dus thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra ba'i grangs la sogs pa skad cig gcig
la yongs su shes pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pas ye shes la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi dbang rnams so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa'i stobs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / sbyor ba'i stobs dang / shes rab kyi
stobs dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / spyod pa'i stobs dang / theg pa'i stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul ba'i stobs dang / byang chub kyi stobs dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i stobs te/ bcu
po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rnams so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyis thos pa 'dzin cing don bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang /
bdag med pa khong du chud pas gzhan gyis gtse ba'i mtshan ma mi 'byung zhing rang bzhin gyis spyod lam smad du med pa'i las gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsrung ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i mi
'jigs pa dang / chos bzung ba yun du mi brjed pa dang / thabs dang shes rab mthar phyin pas sems can sgrol zhing dad pa ston pa dang / dge ba'i bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i mi 'jigs pa dang /
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma nyams shing theg pa gzhan gyis mi 'byung bar dbang yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can gyi don rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par thob par bya ba la mi 'jigs pa
ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ma bstan pa'i
sbyin pa can rnams yin/ ma bstan pa'i tshul khrims can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bzod pa can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan can
rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i shes rab can rnams dang / bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can thams cad sdud pa rnams dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams dang / thabs la mkhas pas sems
can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dbang gi theg pa'i mchog gis 'byung ba ston pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po las ma nyams pa rnams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo ston pa rnams dang / zung dang

snrel zhi'i rgyud la mkhas pa rnams dang / ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i mngon par 'du mi byed cing kha na ma tho ba med par tshe rabs thams cad du mngon par 'phags pa rnams dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi
las kyi mtha' dge ba bcu dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad bzod pa'i lus len pas sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba rnams dang / 'gro ba thams cad mngon
par dga' bar son pa rnams dang / byis pa dang / nyan thos mi bzad pa ji snyed cig gi nang na yang dge ba mang po'i rin po che'i shing dpag bsam ltar bsten pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi sems yongs su ma nyams pa rnams dang / chos thams cad kyi thabs sbyin pas dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba bstan pa las mi ldog pa rnams te/ bcwa brgyad
po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'das
pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi las kyi rgyu'i rnam par smin pa len pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po
mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / rnam par ldang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i
stobs dang / zag pa zad par mkhyen pa'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ chos thams
cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / zag pa thams cad zad par shes pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i
lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba'i 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'grul ba med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / bsnyel ba med pa dang /
sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / mos pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med
pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs
pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /
lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams

cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste/ bcwa brgyad po de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi
bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang
bzhin du 'byung ste/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bdag med pa na sems can rnams ni bdag med par ma mos pas de'i phyir sems can rnams
la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni sems can med pa na sems can rnams ni sems can du smra'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje
chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni srog med pa na sems can rnams ni srog tu smra'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni gang zag
med pa na sems can rnams ni gang zag la gnas pa'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni med pa na sems can rnams ni yod par lta'o zhes
sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni gnas med pa na sems can rnams ni gnas la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje

chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni gzhi med pa na sems can rnams ni gzhi la dga'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni nga yir bya ba med pa na sems can rnams ni nga yir bya ba la rten
te zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa na sems can rnams ni yongs su bzung ba la brtson no zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin
gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa na sems can rnams ni dngos po la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams
cad ma skyes pa na sems can rnams ni skye ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni ma 'phos ma byung ba na sems can rnams ni 'chi

'pho dang / skye ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon ma mongs pa na sems can rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs so/ /zhes sems
can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba na sems can rnams ni 'dod chags par byed do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs

pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang bral ba na sems can rnams zhe sdang bar byed do/ /zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams
cad ni gti mug dang bral ba na sems can rnams ni gti mug par gyur to zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa na sems
can rnams ni 'ong ba la gnas pa'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni 'gro ba med pa na sems can rnams ni 'gro ba la gnas
so zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa na sems can rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod do
zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni spros pa med pa na sems can rnams ni spros pa la dga'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams
la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni stong pa na sems can rnams ni lta ba la zhen to zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa na sems can rnams ni mtshan ma'i spyod yul can no zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos
thams cad ni smon pa med pa na sems can rnams ni smon lam la spyod do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phan
tshun rtsod pas yongs su zin cing gnod sems kyi tha ba'i skyon la zhugs par gzigs nas/ de dag la gnod sems kyi tha ba'i skyon spong ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de
bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phyin ci log dang ldan zhing lam nyam nga bar zhugs pa lam gol ba la gnas pa yin gyis/ de dag la yang dag pa'i lam
du gzud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni brkam zhing 'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa ste/ chog mi shes shing gzhan

gyi nor la 'phrog pa yin gyis de dag 'phags pa'i nor dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i nor la dgod do zhes sems can rnams

la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /kye ma sems can 'di dag ni bu smad dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru la sred pas 'khol ba ste/ snying po med pa la snying por 'du shes pa yin gyis de dag
la shin du mi rtag par bstan par bya'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mi rigs pas 'tsho ba ste/ gcig la gcig 'drid

par gnas pa yin gyis de dag la 'tsho ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chog mi shes pa ste/ rnyed pa dang /
bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la spyod kyang bdag cag ni chog shes pa'o snyam du 'dzin gyis de dag la gang 'di sdug bsngal shin du zhi zhing bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pas shin du chog par bya'o
zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khyim gyi gnas sdug bsngal gyi snod shin du nyon mongs pa la rtag tu dga' ba yin
gyis de dag las phyung zhing khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams
cad ni rgyus nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na/ de la sems can rnams ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba la le lo byed kyis de dag la rnam par grol ba lhur blang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsam
par chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /sems can rnams ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes rnam pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i yongs su mya ngan las

'das pa 'di btang zhing gang 'di nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gyis de dag la gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dmigs par bya ba'i phyir rgya chen po la
blo mos par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye ste/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan na sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs

pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig sems can dag la rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag

dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po skye na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bsod nams kyi zhing gzi brjid chen pos rgyas pa phyir mi ldog pa sems can gyi don la brtson par rig par bya'o/ /snying rje

chen po'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na srog chags stong phrag sum bcu rtsa gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /srog chags brgya stong ni

mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /lha'i bu stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar de dag la sogs pa de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang sgyur gyi chos kyi rnam par 'god pa ni dpag tu med grangs med de/ de dag phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs
pas bstan kyang mtha' med na sems can rnams kyi dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa bskyed pa'i phyir phyogs tsam zhig bstan te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos
dkar po las 'thun par 'byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin no/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin
nus pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor mu med cing rgya che la brtan zhing sra bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang 'byung ba char sprin dang bcas pa/

rgya mtsho dang / gling chen po bzhi bar bcas pa/ ri rab dang / ri btang bzung dang / ri btang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang / khor yug ri dang / khor yug ri chen po dang / ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba dang /
grong rdal dang / 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang gi rnam par bcas pa dag yongs su 'dzin to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang gzungs kyi rlung mar gyi
dkyil 'khor mu med pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprin kyis phab pa'i gtan pa med pa'i chos kyi char gyi rgyun chen po thams cad yongs su 'dzin to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad

'byung ba'i tshe ji skad du brjod pa'i ri rab dang / rgya mtsho dang / gling chen po bzhi pa dang / ri btang bzung dang / ri btang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang / khor yug ri dang / khor yug ri chen po dang / ri spos kyi

ngad ldang ba dang / grong rdal dang / 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang gi rnam pa lta bu bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang / sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang /

mngon par shes pa dang / dbang dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / snying rje chen po la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs

pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin to/ /'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi phung po brgya stong mu med pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yongs su 'dzin te/ de ltar na
byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin nus pa yin no/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba

thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni gzhal med khang dgod pa'i rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs thams cad kun nas gzhog par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed de/

nags tshal dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / ldum bu dang / myu gu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / sdong po la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi yan lag dang / nying lag

rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yongs su gzhog cing rnam par 'byed de gsal bar byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa'i
ye shes ma thogs ma chags shing mtha' yas pas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sgo sna tshogs nas yongs su gzhog par byed/ /rnam par 'byed par byed/

snang bar byed/ yongs su ston par byed/ thob par byed cing rnam pa 'di dag 'di lta ste/ chos 'di dag ni ngan song sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni bde 'gro sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni bdag por sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag

ni sems can dmyal ba sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni byol song gi skye gnas sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni mir sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni lhar sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni 'khor
los sgyur bar sgrub pa'o/ /de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni gzugs dang / g.yog dang / yid gzhungs pa dang /
dpal chen po sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni rig pa'o/ /'di dag ni sgyu rtsal to/ /'di dag ni bzo'i gnas so/ /'di dag ni gtsug lag sna tshogs la rnam pa thams cad du mkhas pa'o/ /'di dag ni nyan thos kyi

theg pa ste/ nyan thos su 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ste/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni theg pa chen po ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bdag dang / gzhan

gyi don yang dag par 'thob par byed pa kun du bzang po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o/ /de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni sa rnams dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams
dang / rig pa rnams dang / dbang rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par
rig pa rnams dang / ma 'dres pa rnams so zhes rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pas gzungs pad ma bkod pa la sogs pa la mkhas pa'i chos
bkod pa rnam par bkod pa dag byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su dgod pa
yin no/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam kyi shing las shin du byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par
'bebs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni dpag bsam kyi shing gi nags tshal dag las gang gis lha dang / mi rnams shin du dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas mya ngan med
par rnam par rtse ba dang / nyams bde zhing yongs su spyod de/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par kha dog dang / stobs dang / mthu dang / yid bde bas yongs su mi nyam pa de lta bu'i spos dang / me tog dang /
rgyan dang / gos dang / rnga dang / sil snyan la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i char mngon par 'bebs/ yongs su skyod cing 'byin par byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang yongs su
dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas sems can dag la gang gis sems can de dag rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos kyi

dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / gzi dang ldan pa dang / yongs su skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams
cad nyams su myong bar byed pa dang / mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyis snang bar gyur pas rtag tu khyad par gyi rnam par 'dod par 'gyur ba'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad

pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / 'di lta bu 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin du rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung
ba dang / gtan la phab par bstan pa dag dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos rin po che'i me tog la sogs pa'i char mngon par 'bebs so/ /lugs dang 'thun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa dang / snrel
gzhi dang / spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud la sogs pa'i gtam rnam par gdon mi za ba nye bar sgrub po/ /tha snyad kyi dmigs pa thams cad la bdag med pa zhi zhing rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid rjod cing ston la
rnam par byang bar byed do/ /chos thams cad ston/ kun du yang dag par gzhol ba yongs su ston to/ /sgyu ma'i rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa nye bar sbyor ro/ /ye shes sgyu ma rnam par rgyas
par byed de/ chos thams cad la dga' bar rtse ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyis sems can rnams yongs su rgyas par byed do/ /'dri ba thams cad kyi lung bstan pas tshim par byed do/ /
mtha' dang dbung med pa'i rdzu 'phrul la mkhas par byed do/ /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin du byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par gdon
mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags pa ting nge

'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs gyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / dge ba'i khor yug gi ri la sogs pas
yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gdul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa/ bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'pho bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil
'khor yongs su gtong ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni bskal pa'i mthar thug ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus na gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ri rab dang / khor yug ri dang / rgya mtsho la sogs par bcas pa kun nas 'jig cing rnam par 'thor ba dang / rmeg med par byed cing nam mkha'i
rang bzhin du byed pa de lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs thogs pa med par ldang ngo / /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang bskal pa mang por bsags pa'i sems can
bsod nams dang / ye shes sna tshogs rnam par bkod pa'i ri mthon po dang ldan pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su bstan

pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med par rab tu bskor ba'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pas chos kyi phung po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang gis 'dul ba chos snang ba'i lhag mthong dang ldan pa/
bzod par mi nus pa'i 'du byed kyi stobs thams cad mnyam par gzhog pa/ tshul bzhin yid la byas nas/ yang dag par sems nang du gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa la brten te/
srid pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi 'du byed kyi lus thams cad bshig cing rnam par gtor te lus med par byas nas yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su brtags pa rnam par bshig ste/
'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzugs med pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs thams cad yongs su bstan pa rnam par gzhig pas
gnas gyur pa rnam par dag pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par gnas pa/ rnam pa thams cad du mtha' dang bral ba rnams thob par byed pa de lta bu kun nas rab tu gtong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang
chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'od dang / zla ba dang /

nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / dge ba'i khor yug ri la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gdul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag
par gnas pa/ bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'pho ba dang / 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
rlung mar lta bu rnams yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /a la la de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa thams
cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhing sems can rlabs po che rnams yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi tshul bcu po 'di bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom
ldan 'das lha dang mi gang la la chos 'di dag la mos shing nan tan bgyid na de dag thams cad ji skad du gsungs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bde ba dang bcas pa yid bde ba dang bcas par thob par 'gyur te/

brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa zhig bgyid na 'ang gzhan gyi don la gzhol zhing tshe 'di dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ sems can gang de lta bu'i chos rnams la nan tan byed de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / kun

tu rnam par bltas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ro/ /gang spong ba'i skyes bu glen pa de
dag ni mun pa nas mun par gzhol ba ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad la rten pa'o/ /lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba'o/ /
'phags pa dkon mchog sprin/ bam po bzhi pa/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dri ma med pa
rnams yin/ ma chags pa rnams yin/ zhi ba rnams yin/ shes rab mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ ye shes mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa'i nyid kyi rjes su song ba rnams yin/
chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du mos pa rnams yin/ so sor mi rten pa rnams yin/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams
yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang

mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang yid du

mi 'ong ba'i sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa dang /

ma rnyed pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / grags pa dang ma grags pa dang / stod pa dang smad pas chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang
chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi
lus rab tu sim par byed pa dang / mthong na dga' ba rnams yin/ chos dkar po rnams skye bar byed pa dang / chos nag po rnams bri bar byed pa dang / rab tu bsngags pa rnams yin/ lus yongs su dag pa
rnams yin/ bzhon pa mchog la zhon pa rnams yin/ rtag tu brgyan pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa rnams yin/ 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la

ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas ji ltar na 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba shar na 'di ltar

sems can thams cad kyi lus bsil ba dang / yid du 'ong bas rab tu sim par byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na yang 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba dang /

dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid du 'ong bas sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba shar na 'di lta ste/ zhi ba dang / dang ba dang / sems

shin du dga' bar byed pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na yang 'di lta ste/ dbang po rnam par gsal ba dang / sems kyi rgyud dang ba dang /

spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba yar gyi ngo la zla ba nya ste/ rnam
pa thams cad du rgyas kyi bar du nyi ma re re zhing 'phel lo/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang thog ma sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/
byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du nyi ma re re zhing chos dkar po rnams 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ nam byang chub gyi snying po la 'dug pa de na rnam pa thams cad du yongs su

rdzogs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba mar gyi ngo la dkyil 'khor kha dog dang / snang ba dang / chu zheng yang yongs su 'bri ste/ bcwa lnga la ji ltar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad
mi mngon pa de ltar 'bri'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thob par gyur pa de na/ de'i mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad du thams cad rab tu

'bri ste/ ji ltar byang chub kyi snying po la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ba de ltar rab tu 'bri'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba shar na bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang /
yul gyi mi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na yang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba'i lus 'di ltar rang gi bsod nams kyi las rnam par smin pas grub pa ni
yongs su dag ste/ rnyog pa med cing dang ba dang / gsal ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i lus kyang 'di lta ste/ chos nyid kyis mngon par grub pa/ rdzus te skyes pa/ pha ma'i
btsog pa dang / mer mer po las byung ba ma yin te/ yongs su dag la rnyog pa med cing dang ba dang gsal ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni bzhon pa mchog la zhon te/ gling
bzhir snang bar byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa mchog la zhon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par snang bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu

'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu brgyan cing rgyan ma rnyings pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang 'di ltar yon tan gyi rgyan rnams kyis rtag tu brgyan pa yin no/ /rigs

kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu rgyun mi chad par lha'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba la mos pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos kyi dga' ba la mos
shing 'dun pa yin gyi 'dod pas dga' ba la dga' ba ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang
'di lta ste/ bsod nams chen po dang / ye shes chen pos 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas 'phrul

che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma dang
'dra ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba rnams yin/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams yin/ phyogs bcu thams cad du lhan ner byed pa rnams
yin de dge ba'i chos mngon par shes pa rnams yin/ de dag gi zag pa nub par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ snang bar byed pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can ngan pa'i lugs rnams zil kyis mnan
te 'dug pa rnams yin/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa kun ston pa rnams yin/ chos dkar po'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung bar byed pa rnams yin/ skye bo dge ba dga' ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu

de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba nas/ ji ltar skye bo dge ba dga' ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par

sel to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na pad ma rnam par 'bye bar byed do/ /de bzhin du byang

chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang gdul ba'i sems can gyi pad ma rnam par 'bye bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na phyogs bcu thams cad du lhan ner byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub

sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang phyogs bcu thams cad du shes rab kyi gzi brjid dang / ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis rab tu lhan ner byed kyang sems can rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/

dper na 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma'i 'od zer dag nam snang ba de'i tshe na shar ces bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od zer rnams nam snang ba de'i tshe na dge ba'i chos rnams shar ces

bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma'i snang ba nam med par gyur pa de'i tshe na nub ces bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams thams cad du
thams cad nam med par gyur pa de'i tshe na zag pa zad ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la snang bar byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba byed cing / gti mug gi mun pa'i rab rib kyis khebs pa rnam par sel to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na 'od thams

cad kyi 'od med par byed kyang nyi ma ni ngas 'od thams cad kyi 'od mi snang bar bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi
ma shar na yang mu stegs can ngan pa'i 'od dang / mu stegs can ngan pa'i lugs thams cad 'od med par 'gyur mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyi ma ni ngas 'di dag 'od med par bya'o snyam du mi sems

mod kyi/ 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa legs par ston to/ /de bzhin du byang

chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang bas mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa legs par ston to/ /rigs kyi bu mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig bla dgas
so/ /rigs kyi bu mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lam ngan pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na rmo brko ba'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du byang

chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang dge ba'i chos las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na skye bo dge ba ni dga' bar 'gyur la/ mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can dag
mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang / skye bo dge ba rnams dang / mkhas pa rnams dang / shes rab kyi rang bzhin can rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur la/
lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams dang / mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / byis pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba rnams

dang / mya ngan las 'das pa las phyir phyogs pa rnams ni mi dga' bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba nas skye bo dge ba dga' ba'i bar du yin no/ /rig

kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
bag mi tsha ba rnams yin/ mi brtabs pa rnams yin/ mi zlogs pa rnams yin/ seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams yin/ nags tshal dang / nags tshal gyi 'dra ba na rgyu ba
rnams yin/ ri'i phug na gnas pa rnams yin/ len pa med pa rnams yin/ bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde rab tu 'jom pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos kyi lo

thog srung ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bag mi tsha ba nas dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog srung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni gar

'gro yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas bag mi tsha zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas gar 'gro yang bag mi tsha zhing mi skrag
par 'gro'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni wa thams cad kyi sgras mi brtabs pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang pha rol gyi rgol ba thams cad kyis brtsad pas brgal

kyang mi brtabs shing rgod pa dang zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni bskugs na phyir mi ldog pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang pha rol rgol ba thams
cad kyis bskugs na mi zlogs shing mi zhum par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni sgra gang gis ri dgas phra mo thams cad dang wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba de
lta bur sgrog go/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra gang gis bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pa'i gzhan mu stegs can gyi ri dgas rnams dang / gzhan
mu stegs can gyi wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu sgrog ste/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge ni bdag tu 'dzin pa las bzlog par bya ba dang / sems can gzhan dag gdul ba'i

dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par de dag la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra mi sgrog go/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni kun du lta yang mi 'jigs pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang
chub sems dpa' seng ge yang spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i nan tan la lta yang mi 'jigs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni rang bzhin gyis nags tshal dang / nags tshal gyi 'dab
na rgyu ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang rang bzhin gyis dben pa la mngon par phyogs shing nags tshal dang / nags tshal gyi 'dab na spyod pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
dper na seng ge ni ri'i phug na gnas pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang ye shes kyis brag ri'i phug na gnas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na
seng ge ni mi len par 'gro ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang nyon mongs pa'i khur thams cad bor zhing len pa med par 'gro ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge
ni gcig pu gnyis su med pa bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas pha rol kyi sde 'joms so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang gcig pu gnyis su med par byang chub

kyi snying po la 'dug nas bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde 'jom mo/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na grong gi 'dab gang na seng ge rgyu ba der ri dgas phra mo dag gis

lo thog rnams chud mi gzon to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na 'dug pa der mu stegs can gyi ri dgas phra mo dag gis dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog chud mi gzon

te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bag mi tsha ba nas dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog srung ba'i bar du yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge dang 'dra ba
rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems brtan pa rnams yin/ byang chub kyi sems byi dor
shin du byas pa rnams yin/ dbang po bsdams pa rnams yin/ lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/ khur chen po khyer bor ba rnams yin/ sems can gyi don rnams la yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin/
yang dag pas 'tsho ba rnams yin/ tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag gi rnyed pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo sgyu dang bral ba rnams yin/ drang ba'i rang bzhin can bas drang ba rnams yin no/ /

rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa med cing kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral bas lam gyi rgyun ma bcad pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' mi gcog
pas bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rtogs pas chos thams cad kyi tshul mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ dma' ba dma' ba'i yid kyis gdol bu ltar 'jig rten na spyod

pa rnams yin/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsod snyoms blang bar 'du shes nye bar gzhag pas nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di ltar de mngon sum du shes pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi
chos thams cad la nem nur med pa rnams yin/ chos rang gis rig pa'i phyir the tsom med pa rnams yin/ rang gis lam mthong bas gzhan gyis mi bkri zhing pha rol gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/ rab tu

zhugs pas 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin no/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub
sems dpa' pad ma dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma gos pa rnams yin/ sdig pa chung ngu yang lhan cig mi gnas pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims kyi dri zhim pa rnams yin/ gtsang ba
rnams yin/ bzhin 'dzum pa rnams yin/ mi rtsub pa rnams yin/ mthong na bkra shis pa rnams yin/ blo rnam par bye ba rnams yin/ blo yongs su smin pa rnams yin/ shin du yongs su bzung ba

rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa yin pa nas ji ltar na shin du yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma ni chu'i nang nas 'byung yang mi

chags par skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chu las 'byung yang mi chags par skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i thabs dang / shes rab

kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni 'khor ba na spyod kyang 'khor ba'i nyes pa dag gis mi gos te/ de'i thabs de ni shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu

'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma la ni chu'i thigs pa chung ngu yang mi chags so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa chung ngu yang mi chags so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa'i phyogs gang du pad ma skyes par

gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs de dris khyab par 'dug go/ /de bzhin du yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa de thams cad tshul khrims kyi dris khyab par 'dug go/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/

dper na pad ma ni sa'i phyogs gar skyes pa'i sa phyogs de gtsang zhing bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi thams cad kyang 'du ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gar skyes kyang

rung 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang / gtsang sbra kun spyod pas gtsang ba yin te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi
ma yin pa rnams 'du ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma ni kha

'bye na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi yid du 'ong bas 'dzum pa lta bur snang ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang khro gnyer med cing dbang po shin tu dang bas bzhin rtag tu 'dzum pa yin no/ /rigs

kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing mi rtsub pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing dal gyis smra ba yin/ mi brlang zhing mu cor mi smra ba'i rang bzhin

can yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma ni rmi lam dang / ltas dang / yud tsam dag la mthong na yang 'di lta ste/ don 'grub pa'i phyir bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems

dpa' mthong ba yang 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba la dus thams cad du 'ang bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma ni nam rgyas pa de na rnam par bye ba zhes bya'o/ /

de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam shes rab dang / byang chub kyi yan lag me tog rgyas pa de na blo rnam par bye ba zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma ni nam yongs su smin par gyur pa de na bltas na
mig gi dbang po tshim par byed/ mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po tshim par byed/ mnams na sna'i dbang po tshim par byed/ reg na lus kyi dbang po tshim par byed/ sems rab tu dga' bas yid kyi dbang po tshim

par byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam shes rab kyi snang ba yongs su smin par gyur pa de'i tshe bltas na mig gi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po rnam par dag
par byed/ tshul khrims dang yon tan gyi dri mnams na sna'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ reg pa dang bsnyen bkur byas na lus kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ yon tan brjod pa rnam par
bsams pas yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma ni skye ba'i tshe 'di lta ste/ mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis shin du yongs su bzung ba yin te/ de bzhin du

byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba'i tshe sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag gis shin du yongs su bzung ba
yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa nas shin du yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' pad ma dang 'dra ba
rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad yang dag par sgrub bo zhes sems

rgya cher skyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/ /sems can thams cad gdul lo zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/ /byang chub kyi snying por 'dug ste/
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten du dge sbyong ngam/
bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang chos dang ldan par sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams mtha'

yas mu med par song ste/ sems can gyi don bya ba'i dngos po de dang de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don bya'o zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do/ /shes rab kyi gru sbyar te sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral
lo zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/ /mgon med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / rten med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi gnyen bya'o zhes sems rgya

cher skyed do/ /lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog

nyid bstan to/ /sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol bas rnam par rtse'o/ /glang po chen po'i blta bas blta bar bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi che
bas sems can rnams gdul bar bya'i spyod pa ngan pas ma yin/ dka' bar spyod pas ma yin/ zhan pa'i spyod pas ma yin/ zhum pa'i spyod pas ma yin no zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/ /rigs
kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/
'di lta ste/ bsam pa mi g.yo bas bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa la sgyu med pas bsam pa shin du gnas pa rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi byang chub yid la byed

pa mi skyed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / brtson pa chung ba'i yid la byed pa mi skyed pas tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/
nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral bas dri ma thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma'i spyod lam dang bral bas lus kyi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ yang
dag pa'i don kun ston pas ngag gi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin no/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyis 'du 'dzi med pa dang / ngag gis 'dod pa chung ba dang / sems kyi smon pa med pa'i phyir sems kyi
tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ cung zad byas pa yang chud mi gzon na mang po lta ci smos te/ byas pa gzo ba rnams yin/ byas pa tshor ba rnams yin te/ dgos pa byas pa la mi smod mi
skyud/ yon tan ma yin par mi lta ste/ gzhan du na cung zad byas pa yang tshor zhing de la bstod par byed/ /gzeng bstod par byed/ yang dag par dga' bar byed/ rab tu bsngags par byed/ /de la yon
tan du lta ba yin no/ /ji ltar smra ba de ltar byed pa rnams yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis snyan par ston cing sems kyis mi mthun par sems pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
ngag gis ston cing sems kyis ngan du bya ba'i sbyor ba mi byed/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis 'jam par smra zhing sems kyis zhe la non te shar gnyer ba rnams ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams lus kyis des pa ston cing sems kyis 'khon gyi mdud par 'dzin pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis ri mor bya ba ston cing sems kyis brnyas par byed pa ma yin/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams tshul mi 'chos/ kha gsag mi byed/ 'jungs pa dang phrag dog gis kun tu glags pa ma yin/ sgyu dang g.yos mi spyod/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'thab smyan mi byed/ phan tshun dpar

ba 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis kyang re mo byed pa yin/ ngag gis kyang yang dag pa'i don smra ba las su rung ba yang sgrub bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs
pa'i bstan pa la skur pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa dang bral ba rnams yin no/ /ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa ma btab pa yin zhe na/
'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ skra dang kha spu bregs/ gos ngur smrig dag gyon nas yang dag par dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan

pa la rab tu 'byung ngo / /de rab tu 'byung ba na rgyal pos mnar ba med par rab tu 'byung / rkun pos gtse ba med pa dang / bu lon gyis gtse ba med pa dang / 'jigs pas gtse ba med pa dang / 'tsho ba med
pa'i 'jigs pas skrag pa med par rab tu 'byung ngo / /de dang de rab tu byung nas dge ba ci yin zhes 'tshol ba yin te/ de dge ba ci yin zhes tshol ba yin pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par
byed/ sten par byed/ bsnyen bkur byed do/ /de dag las chos kyang nyan to/ /thos nas kyang nan tan byed/ nga rgyal gyi zil gyis mnon pa yin te/ de nga rgyal dang bral bas ma log par 'dzin pa yin/

ma log par 'dzin pas lam shin du rtogs pa thob bo/ /de lam shin du rtogs pas chos nyid thob po/ /chos nyid thob pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/ de ltar na de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa ma btab pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang
chub sems dpa' sems nem nur med pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba
dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par sgrub pa dang / byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang / theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa dang /
tshul sna tshogs bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad pa nas ji ltar na sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
'di snyam du sems so/ /gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang / zhi ba'i sku dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sku dang / tshad med pa'i sku dang / phal la med pa'i sku dang / rdo rje'i sku
zhes bya ba thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/ /'di ni de kho na'o/ /'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med cing the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i
gsang ba la mngon par dad do/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so/ /gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
gi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni mngon sum du lung ston pa dang / gsang ste lung ston pa dang / ldem po ngag gis kyang sems can rnams la lung ston mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa 'am

ca co med de/ de'i phyir de la brdzun du smra ba'i nyes pa mi 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni skyon thams cad spangs pa/ dri ma thams cad spangs pa/ rdul thams cad spangs pa/ yongs
su gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ zhi ba dang ba/ yongs su dag pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ rnam par gsal ba ste/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'khrul pa 'am/

ca co 'byung ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing bskabs med do zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/ /'di ni de kho na'o/ /'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med/ the tsom med de de ltar na de bzhin
gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la mngon par dad do/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so/ /gang 'di de bzhin gshegs
pa'i yid kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pas ci dgongs pa'i don gang sems dang 'grogs pa/ sems la gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gyur pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang
sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis shes par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gting dpag
dka' ba/ brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las shin du 'das pa/ dpag tu med pa/ rgya che ba/ yangs pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa/ rtog ge thams cad kyi yul las 'das par

thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/ 'di ni de kho na'o/ /'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med the tsom med pa yin te/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad do/ /ji ltar
na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par sgrub pa la mngon par dang ba das na de 'di ltar sems so/ /gang 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi rgyu/ byang chub kyi gzhi/ byang chub kyi phyir

byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can gyi don la mngon du phyogs pa dang / sems can gyi bya ba dang / sems can gyi byed pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba dang / mi skrag pa dang / khur chen po khyer ba dang /

mthu brtan pa dang / rtul ba brtan pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mthar kyis yang dag par sgrub pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i blo dang / mtha' yas pa'i

blo dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i blo dang / phal la med pa'i blo dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / go cha brtan pa dang / dam bcas pa la brtan pa dang / dam bcas pa las mi g.yo ba dang / dam bcas
pa phal la med pa de dag thams cad rim gyis 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/ /'di ni de kho na'o/ /'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/
gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par sgrub pa la mngon par dad do/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung

ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so/ /gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas lha'i mig chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa sgrib pa med pa 'thob po/ /lha'i rna ba dang / gzhan
gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa dang / dus gsum pa skad cig gcig dang ldan pas shes pa chags pa
pa med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa 'thob po/ /de'i phyir sems can gyi khams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lta ste/ sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi

ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa yid kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba rnams te/ log par lta ba'i las dang / chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir de'i rgyu de'i rkyen
de'i gzhis lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag du skye'o/ /sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang

ldan pa/ yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba rnams te/ yang dag par lta ba'i las dang / chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir de'i rgyu de'i rkyen

de'i gzhis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye'o snyam nas de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams la lta ste/ sems can gyi khams de nyid kyang dge ba dang /
mi dge ba'i las rnams la rnam par lta'o/ /de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas gang 'di ltar bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas gzhan yang rnam par
sangs rgyas par bya'o zhes dam bcas pa'i bdag gi smon lam de yongs su rdzogs so/ /bdag gi brnag pa de yongs su rdzogs so snyam mo zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/ /'di ni de kho na'o/ /'di ni mi
slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med/ the tsom med do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' de rnam par sangs rgyas pa de ni byang chub ces bya'o/ /bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i na rdzogs par
sangs rgyas shes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad do/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan

pa la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so/ /gang 'di theg pa ni gcig kho na te/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/ /'di ni de kho na'o/ /'di ni mi slu ba'o/ /

'di ni de bzhin pa'o/ /ma nor pa'o/ /gzhan ma yin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa gzhan rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i gling na gang gling yod pa rnams ming

gis tha dad par shes mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'du'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling la rten to/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi grangs su 'gro'o/ /de'i phyir na gling gcig kho na ste/ de ni 'dzam bu'i gling ngo / /
de bzhin du theg pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg par 'du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa la gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa las byung ba'o/ /de'i phyir theg pa gcig
kho na te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par dad do/ /
ji ltar na tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so/ /gang 'di mdo sde de dang de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs bshad pa thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/ /
'di ni de kho na'o/ /'di ni mi slu ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston to snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem
nur med/ the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dad do/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon

par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so/ /gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/ /'di ni de kho na'o/ /'di ni mi slu ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung
ngu'i lha'i bu rnams kyi dbyangs kyang zab cing snyan pa yin na/ bskal pa brgya stong du mar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lta ci smos snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med/
the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon par dad do/ /rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ji
lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so/ /gang 'di de bzhin gshegs p+sa bsam pa dang / bag la nyal mkhyen te/ sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang / 'dul ba tha dad
pa rnams la gsung sgra'i dbyangs gcig brjod pas the tsom gcod cing yongs su smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams 'dul lo/ /sems can rnams kyang so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la

chos ston te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to snyam byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnams par mi rtog go snyam thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/ /'di ni de kho na'o/ /'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas
'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
sems dpa' sems nem nur med pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ rgya che zhing tshad med pa rnams yin/ bags kyis gzhol ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i ro dang lhan cig mi
'dug pa rnams yin/ ro gcig pa rnams yin/ chu bo kun zed pa rnams yin/ dus las mi yol ba rnams yin/ 'byung po mang po'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/ mi zad pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu

de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin pa nas ji ltar na mi zad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni rin po che thams cad kyi

'byung gnas yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyis rin po che blang bas mi zad do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ sems can thams cad

kyis yon tan rin po che blang bas mi zad do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa yang

zab cing sems can thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' zhing zab pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di lta ste/ chu tshad med pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no/ /de bzhin du

byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ blo tshad med pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni bags gyis gzhol/ bags kyis 'bab/ bags kyis bab bo/ /

de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bab bo/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i

ro dang lhan cig mi 'dug go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chos nyid do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i ro dang mi dge ba'i grogs po rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen por chu bo ji snyed bab pa de dag thams cad kyang ro gcig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ lan tshwa'i ro'o/ /de bzhin du

byang chub sems dpa' yang chos dkar po rnams ji snyed sdud pa de dag thams cad ro gcig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ro'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu bo

tshad med pa kun zed kyang de la bri ba 'am/ gang bar yang mi mngon no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu bo tshad med pa kun zed kyang de la bri ba 'am/ gang bar mi mngon no/ /rigs kyi bu
'di lta ste dper na / rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las mi yol lo/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang gdul bar bya ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus las mi yol lo/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta
ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni 'byung po mang po'i gnas so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad dang / chos dkar po thams cad kyi gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can thams cad kyis chu bcus kyang mi zad pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad la chos ston pa mi zad pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu
de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa nas mi zad pa'i bar du yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang
mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos
thams cad brtag pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du khong du chud pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad
yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ smras pa'i
don shes pa rnams yin/ don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa rnams yin/ de kho na la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa
yin pa nas ji ltar na de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi mes kun du 'bar ro/ /rab
tu 'bar ro/ /kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar ro/ /kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang gi du ba 'khrigs pa'i du ba 'tshubs pas rnam par rmongs so/ /kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di

ni 'di lta ste/ gti mug gi mun pas mun nag tu gyur to snyam mo/ /de 'di ltar sems can 'di dag ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam sems te/ de de dag gi 'byung ba yongs su tshol zhing chos thams cad la rtog
go/ /chos thams cad la rtogs pas chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag

pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /chos rnams sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad yang dag
